Environmental density from presence points

Source: R/get_density.R
get_density.Rd

Environmental density from presence points

Usage

get_density(df, env)

Arguments

df

A data frame with presence points

env

A raster stack with environmental information

Value

A data frame with environmental information and the probability density for each point

Examples

get_density(spOccPnts)
#>         bio1WH bio12WH         dens
